name: Crush
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Everything within a 30 foot radius of target point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, they are thrown as close to the center of the point as possible, and take 3d10 bludgeoning damage plus 1d10 bludgeoning damage for each additional creature or object of Medium or larger size pulled in, to a maximum of 4d10 additional damage. A creature that succeeds takes 2d10 bludgeoning damage and is moved 5 feet towards the point.

If multiple creatures or objects would occupy the same space, you choose which creature or object occupies what space.
